content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Dazing Thud The target is stunned 1. Bludgeoning
Cheek Pierced The target must succeed at a DC 5 flat check to cast spells with a verbal component until healed. Piercing
Across the Eyes Normal damage. The target is blinded until healed. Slashing
Slowed Down The target is slowed 2 for 1 round. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #31
